title: British Politics spam thread | Page 3375 | Not606
text:
Makemstine Roger said: â†‘ Samurai sword attacker found NOT GUILTY by multicultural London jury
A 'Black Lives Matter' extremist who attacked Britain First activists with a samurai sword has been found 'Not Guilty' by a multicultural jury in London.
Despite the entire incident being captured on nearby CCTV and an iPhone, a biased and politically motivated jury found the attacker not guilty.
It was admitted, and proven , in court that the attacker in question pushed and punched Paul Golding, chased our activists with a brick, threatened them with a shovel, then brandished a samurai sword while threatening to chop their heads off.
The attacker even acted aggressive in court, arguing with the prosecutor and being reprimanded by the judge.
The British legal system has now collapsed due to race-based left-wing politics.
We are living in a new 'Dark Age' of two-tier justice based on politics and race.
You can attack people with weapons , it seems, as long as you are black (or Muslim).
Watch Paul Golding's shocking video explaining the situation:
please log in to view this image Click to expand... Where are you getting this from Roger, because the first line is completely untrue.
He was at Medway Magistrates today, because the defendent is from Dartford, Kent - the case has been referred to Woolwich Crown Court, which would make sense, his next appearance is on the 9th Nov for a preliminary hearing.
